name: Postmark
description: Integrate with Postmark to send, list, send and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Send Email
tools.description: Send a transactional email via Postmark. Supports plain text and HTML content, plus CC and BCC recipients.

tools.name: List Templates
tools.description: List email templates from Postmark. Returns template names, IDs, and types.

tools.name: Send Template
tools.description: Send a templated email via Postmark. Provide the template ID or alias and the template model (variables).

tools.name: Get Delivery Stats
tools.description: Get delivery statistics from Postmark. Returns counts for bounces by type (hard, soft, spam complaints, etc.).

tools.name: Search Messages
tools.description: Search outbound messages sent via Postmark. Filter by recipient, tag, subject, or status.
